title: Bug 17618 - Changing output location does not delete derived resources
OB: When a project is created with auto build enabled, Java sources and resources are imported, and the output folder is changed to project/bin, all class files are correctly removed. Then, when the output folder is changed back to the project, all class files are again removed. However, after changing the output folder back to the project, the resources in the project/bin folder are not deleted. It's important to note that when viewing the properties of these resources, they are tagged as "Derived".
EB: Bug 17618 - Changing output location should delete all derived resources created by the Java builder.
